title: Stability / Swiss / Exercise Ball Dumbbell Chest Flyes
description: Gymnastic Ring L-Holds Resistance Band Push-ups / Pushups Double Side Jackknifes Browse all exercises Stability / swiss / exercise ball dumbbell chest flyes is a gym work out exercise that targets abs and chest and also involves shoulders and triceps. Refer to the illustration diagram and instructions above for how to perform this exercise correctly. Gymnastic ring l-holds, resistance band push-ups / pushups and double side jackknifes are related exercise that target the same muscle groups as stability / swiss / exercise ball dumbbell chest flyes.
